description: Oil prices are up to levels not seen in more than a year -- blame Egypt, blame the economy, and blame yourself?
teaser: Oil prices are up to levels not seen in more than a year -- blame Egypt, blame the economy, and blame yourself?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 11, 2013
contentencoded: Oil prices are up to levels not seen in more than a year -- blame Egypt, blame the improving economy, and blame yourself? Marketplace's Noel King joins Mark Garrison to discuss the various reasons behind the surge.
title: Higher gas prices: A supply and demand story
